H0.text: According to the Quran, a man is allowed to have as many as four what. Mistress

H1.text: According to the Quran, a man is allowed to have as many as four what. Concubine

H2.text: According to the Quran, a man is allowed to have as many as four what. Sister-in-law

H3.text: According to the Quran, a man is allowed to have as many as four what. Wife

A5.text: According to the Shariah (Law) and the Quran, Muslim men are allowed to practice polygyny, taking up to four legal wives.
